quote: Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: The Universe is under no obligation to make sense to you.
name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: But a city is more than a place in space, it is a drama in time.
name: Patrick Geddes

quote: For the wise man looks into space and he knows there is no limited dimensions.
name: Zhuangzi

quote: I would like to die on Mars. Just not on impact.
name: Elon Musk

quote: Oh, don't let's ask for the moon. We've already got the stars.
name: Bette Davis

quote: That's one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind.
name: Neil Armstrong

quote: Nothing exists except atoms and empty space; everything else is opinion.
name: Democritus

quote: Space exploration is a force of nature unto itself that no other force in society can rival.
name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: Space is the breath of art.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: There is always space for improvement, no matter how long you've been in the business.
name: Oscar De La Hoya

quote: Houston, Tranquillity Base here. The Eagle has landed.
name: Neil Armstrong

quote: The stars don't look bigger, but they do look brighter.
name: Sally Ride

quote: Your sacred space is where you can find yourself again and again.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: Each time I think I've created time for myself, along comes a throwback to disrupt my private space.
name: Wole Soyinka

quote: Many a trip continues long after movement in time and space have ceased.
name: John Steinbeck

quote: Architecture is the thoughtful making of space.
name: Louis Kahn

quote: The moon is a friend for the lonesome to talk to.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: Some people think happiness is a luxury, but it's a necessity. You need to make space for it in your life.
name: Christie Brinkley

quote: Architecture is basically the design of interiors, the art of organizing interior space.
name: Philip Johnson

quote: Be exactly who you are. You can fit in any space you see yourself in. Be fearless.
name: Dawn Richard

quote: I love the desert and its incomparable sense of space.
name: Robyn Davidson

quote: When we're in that kind of childish space, we're more genuine and feel more comfortable with our friends.
name: Evan Spiegel

quote: Anything humans can do in space, robots can do better.
name: Trevor Paglen

quote: Planets move in ellipses with the Sun at one focus.
name: Johannes Kepler

quote: Make an empty space in any corner of your mind, and creativity will instantly fill it.
name: Dee Hock

quote: When I'm home, I like a cozy, comfortable, calming space.
name: Stacy Keibler

quote: I think that the ideal space must contain elements of magic, serenity, sorcery and mystery.
name: Luis Barragan

quote: What art offers is space - a certain breathing room for the spirit.
name: John Updike

quote: Hey sky, take off your hat, I'm on my way!
name: Valentina Tereshkova

quote: Circles create soothing space, where even reticent people can realize that their voice is welcome.
name: Margaret J. Wheatley

quote: We are aware only of the empty space in the forest, which only yesterday was filled with trees.
name: Anna Freud

quote: Space Mountain may be the oldest ride in the park, but it has the longest line.
name: Ric Flair

quote: In a modern loft, you can't just fill a space with furniture. Each piece has to be perfect.
name: Nate Berkus

quote: What is the use of a house if you haven't got a tolerable planet to put it on?
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: There are no passengers on spaceship earth. We are all crew.
name: Marshall McLuhan

quote: The space shuttle is a better and safer rocket than it was before the Challenger accident.
name: Sally Ride

quote: The space within becomes the reality of the building.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Once you've been in space, you appreciate how small and fragile the Earth is.
name: Valentina Tereshkova

quote: For NASA, space is still a high priority.
name: Dan Quayle

quote: You can only really hear the beat of your own drum if you give yourself the space to sit in it.
name: Ari Graynor

quote: If the Sun and Moon should ever doubt, they'd immediately go out.
name: William Blake

quote: Find joy and solace in the simple, and cultivate your utopia by feeling the Tao in every cubic inch of space.
name: Wayne Dyer

quote: In so many and such important ways, then, do the planets bear witness to the earth's mobility.
name: Nicolaus Copernicus

quote: Cyberspace can't compensate for real space. We benefit from chatting to people face to face.
name: Jonathan Sacks

quote: If we drive down the cost of transportation in space, we can do great things.
name: Elon Musk

quote: A pedestal is as much a prison as any small, confined space.
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: The greatest thing we can do is to give each other a safe space to truly, truly be ourselves in the world.
name: Sara Bareilles

quote: Be intentional with your space. Don't be afraid to step on a limb and design your home the way you love it.
name: Joanna Gaines

quote: I would rather be a superb meteor, every atom of me in magnificent glow, than a sleepy and permanent planet.
name: Jack London

quote: If the Earth gets hit by an asteroid, it's game over. It's control-alt-delete for civilization.
name: Bill Nye

quote: After one look at this planet any visitor from outer space would say 'I want to see the manager.'
name: William S. Burroughs

quote: If you put enough smart people together in one space, good things happen.
name: Erik Hersman

quote: When you're getting ready to launch into space, you're sitting on a big explosion waiting to happen.
name: Sally Ride

quote: Most whale photos you see show whales in this beautiful blue water - it's almost like space.
name: Brian Skerry

quote: A zero-gravity flight is a first step toward space travel.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: If you want a nation to have space exploration ambitions, you've got to send humans.
name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: I don't think the human race will survive the next thousand years, unless we spread into space.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: Land on Mars, a round-trip ticket - half a million dollars. It can be done.
name: Elon Musk

quote: You think of floating on a rock in space as so alien, but that's exactly what we're doing.
name: Winnie Harlow

quote: Coming home to a tidy, pulled-together space will help everything in your life feel the same way.
name: Bobby Berk

quote: The eternal silence of these infinite spaces frightens me.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: The modern artist is working with space and time, and expressing his feelings rather than illustrating.
name: Jackson Pollock

quote: The rhythm of relations of color and size makes the absolute appear in the relativity of time and space.
name: Piet Mondrian

quote: When we judge, we are always in a psychic space which is circular.
name: Rene Girard

quote: The thought of a limit to perceptual space and time staggers the mind.
name: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: I don't know what you could say about a day in which you have seen four beautiful sunsets.
name: John Glenn

quote: I can't deal with someone wanting to take a relationship backward or needing space or cheating on you.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: The most important thing about Spaceship Earth - an instruction book didn't come with it.
name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: I'm lucky to be in a space where I've been accepted for who I am and celebrated for who I am.
name: Chance The Rapper

quote: There's always room to volunteer. I think that's a huge space to be involved with.
name: Halima Aden

quote: I am absolutely certain that life can exist in outer space, move around, find a new aqueous environment.
name: Craig Venter

quote: Islam is about finding your own space.
name: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: Darkness is to space what silence is to sound, i.e., the interval.
name: Marshall McLuhan

quote: I'm very inspired by outer space.
name: Selah Louise Marley

quote: Inner space is so much more interesting, because outer space is so empty.
name: Theodore Sturgeon

quote: I see nothing in space as promising as the view from a Ferris wheel.
name: E. B. White

quote: The works I made at the start of my career rely on the themes of war, atomic power, and outer space.
name: Takashi Murakami

quote: I'm a little territorial and defensive. I don't like having my space invaded.
name: Shia LaBeouf

quote: I already find pyramids from space. Is there anything cooler than that?
name: Sarah Parcak

quote: For me, art doesn't stop at the gallery space.
name: Petra Collins

quote: Sculpture occupies the same space as your body.
name: Anish Kapoor

quote: Everything has a natural explanation. The moon is not a god, but a great rock, and the sun a hot rock.
name: Anaxagoras

quote: Your belief system saturates the space around you.
name: Aaron Huey

quote: A word carries far, very far, deals destruction through time as the bullets go flying through space.
name: Joseph Conrad

quote: Rocket science is tough, and rockets have a way of failing.
name: Sally Ride

quote: The space station here is a magical place and an incredible science facility.
name: Scott Kelly

quote: Houston, we've had a problem.
name: Jim Lovell

quote: The rockets and the satellites, spaceships that we're creating now, we're pollinating the universe.
name: Neil Young

quote: On Earth, men and women are taking the same risks. Why shouldn't we be taking the same risks in space?
name: Valentina Tereshkova

quote: Develop a mind so filled with love that it resembles space.
name: Sharon Salzberg

quote: The kitchen is a sacred space.
name: Marc Forgione

quote: I'm not scared. I always go forward, trying to create space and make my way toward the goal.
name: Neymar

quote: When you feel comfortable about your game, you are in a happy space, feel at peace with yourself.
name: Gautam Gambhir

quote: The Earth is the cradle of humanity, but mankind cannot stay in the cradle forever.
name: Konstantin Tsiolkovsky

quote: Ye stars! which are the poetry of heaven!
name: Lord Byron

quote: America has tossed its cap over the wall of space.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: Our life is full of empty space.
name: Umberto Eco

quote: The philosophy of FIFA is to expand world soccer space, to spread out the world football space.
name: Vladimir Putin

quote: Be not entangled in this world of days and nights; Thou hast another time and space as well.
name: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: Between stimulus and response, there is a space where we choose our response.
name: Stephen Covey

quote: I think we are at the dawn of a new era in commercial space exploration.
name: Elon Musk

quote: I have wanted to fly into space for many years, but never imagined it would really be feasible.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: Perhaps one day I will go into space.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: Architecture is the will of an epoch translated into space.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: Acting is about going into the space, and there are just some places that I'm not willing to go.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Space ails us moderns: we are sick with space.
name: Robert Frost

quote: They say any landing you can walk away from is a good one.
name: Alan Shepard

quote: I think the human race doesn't have a future if it doesn't go into space.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: Time can behave like another direction in space under extreme conditions.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: Language is a virus from outer space.
name: William S. Burroughs

quote: It is only in the world of objects that we have time and space and selves.
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: Space only becomes ordinary when the frontier is no longer being breached.
name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: An all-white space has a purity that is refreshing and serene.
name: Mary Helen Bowers

quote: The scientific theory I like best is that the rings of Saturn are composed entirely of lost airline luggage.
name: Mark Russell

quote: I want to party in space because I make alien music.
name: David Guetta

quote: Your body has space within you that cannot die.
name: Wayne Dyer

quote: I don't think I could live with anybody. I had roommates, and it's not for me. I like my space!
name: Ashley Benson

quote: Karma is only in space time and causality. Your real self resides non-locally.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: Space in general gave us GPS - that's not specifically NASA, but it's investments in space.
name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: Space enthusiasts are the most susceptible demographic to delusion that I have ever seen.
name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: Space is almost infinite. As a matter of fact, we think it is infinite.
name: Dan Quayle

quote: Make space in your life, space for health and happiness.
name: Kris Carr

quote: It doesn't matter what country or what political system you are from. Space brings you together.
name: Valentina Tereshkova

quote: If women can be railroad workers in Russia, why can't they fly in space?
name: Valentina Tereshkova

quote: In my solitude I have pondered much on the incomprehensible subjects of space, eternity, life and death.
name: Alfred Russel Wallace

quote: I want my portraits to create a space where blackness can breathe.
name: Amy Sherald

quote: We've gotta reinvest in space travel. We should've never left the moon.
name: Ray Bradbury

quote: Space travel for everyone is the next frontier in the human experience.
name: Buzz Aldrin

quote: Great industries are never made from single companies. There is room in space for a lot of winners.
name: Jeff Bezos

quote: Everyone, red state, blue state, everyone supports space exploration.
name: Bill Nye

quote: My brain is just so busy. I'm inattentive; I'm a daydreamer: the space cadet kind.
name: Hannah Gadsby

quote: Love is space and time measured by the heart.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: In a small space, you want to keep the bedding as simple as possible so it looks clean, calm and collected.
name: Nate Berkus

quote: Why not a space flower? Why do we always expect metal ships?
name: W. D. Richter

quote: If anyone has a vested interest in space solar power, it would have to be me.
name: Elon Musk

quote: Journalism: an ability to meet the challenge of filling the space.
name: Rebecca West

quote: The first thing to know about space food - it is the ambiance; it is the environment. It is not the food.
name: John M. Grunsfeld

quote: There was a space program before there was integrated circuits.
name: Jack Kilby

quote: When you launch in a rocket, you're not really flying that rocket. You're just sort of hanging on.
name: Michael P. Anderson

quote: Losing my daughter was a very serious pain. There was always some empty space in my heart.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: My type of basketball is about how to create space, how to maneuver, how to get your shot off.
name: Hakeem Olajuwon

quote: Profound subject matter can be encompassed in small space - for proof, look at any sonnet by Shakespeare!
name: Cynthia Ozick

quote: Forget the technique. Hit the guy across from you. Don't let somebody come in your space.
name: Karl Malone

quote: Vanity can create a very cruel space for you if you don't know how to manage it.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: Sometimes siblings can get in each other's space.
name: Gisele Bundchen

quote: All architecture has a public nature, I believe, so I would like to make a public space.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: My buildings should have an emotional core - a space which, in itself, has an emotional nice feeling.
name: Peter Zumthor

quote: Revealing water in significant quantities on the Moon could truly be a turning point in space exploration.
name: Peter Diamandis

quote: I feel like I'm at a really happy, good space.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: Whenever I see a nighttime picture of Earth from space, with its glowing lights, I am stirred by its beauty.
name: David Grinspoon

quote: Every day sees humanity more victorious in the struggle with space and time.
name: Guglielmo Marconi

quote: I have a lot of objects in my space, little things, reminders, memories.
name: Marc Newson

quote: Don't even try to talk to me when I'm watching the moon. That's my moon, baby.
name: Wendelin Van Draanen

quote: Now, juggling can be a lot of fun; play with skill and play with space, play with rhythm.
name: Michael Moschen

quote: I like black because it is a vacant space.
name: Lady Gaga

name: Chuck Yeager

quote: There is just one thing I can promise you about the outer-space program - your tax-dollar will go further.
name: Wernher von Braun

quote: That great Cathedral space which was childhood.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: When I'm up, I'm over-exuberant; when I'm down, I just wander round on my own. I have no middle space.
name: Simon Sebag Montefiore

quote: I'm looking forward to coming back, back to Earth, the landing, the views.
name: Duane G. Carey

quote: My work has always dealt with a kind of space that allows one to daydream.
name: Robert Wilson

quote: Space has always been confusing to politics.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: A space station is a rangy monstrosity, a giant erector set built by a madman.

quote: I do a lot of running and hiking, and I also collect stamps - space stamps and Olympics stamps.
name: Sally Ride

quote: There are aspects of being the first woman in space that I'm not going to enjoy.
name: Sally Ride

quote: In any relationship, after the first year is over, you can't help but want your own space.
name: Helena Bonham Carter

quote: Space is to place as eternity is to time.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: When I left NASA, I was looking at how you could use space technologies for developing countries' work.
name: Mae Jemison

quote: I want to live in a space that I designed, that is for me.
name: Guillermo del Toro

quote: I love having beautiful furniture and things, but I don't want my space to look like a showroom.
name: Brad Goreski

quote: Nothing puzzles me more than the time and space; and yet nothing troubles me less.
name: Charles Lamb

quote: But let them sleep, Lord, and me mourn a space.
name: John Donne

quote: Space or science fiction has become a dialect for our time.
name: Doris Lessing

quote: I'm in all my films, I can't help it. I just jam myself in there if there's a space.
name: Taika Waititi

quote: Mining asteroids will ultimately benefit humanity on and off the Earth in a multitude of ways.
name: Peter Diamandis

quote: The first private space of my own wasn't a dorm room; it was a hotel room in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
name: Rob Lowe

quote: Metaphors have a way of holding the most truth in the least space.
name: Orson Scott Card

quote: And of course, I absolutely loved making Lost in Space as a kid.
name: Bill Mumy

quote: I often feel newspapers are just filling up space. Of course, I also know people who write really long books.
name: Vikram Seth

quote: The people who built the space program - both Soviet and U.S. - were readers of science fiction.
name: Gregory Benford

quote: I describe my personal style as 'mythic space horse with chocolate box tendencies.'
name: Gwendoline Christie

quote: I find texting to be kind of a safe space.
name: Mary H.K. Choi

quote: I love horror movies in space. I love it when the genre switches over and what was sci-fi becomes horror.
name: Kirk Hammett

quote: Competitive golf is played mainly on a five-and-a-half-inch course... the space between your ears.
name: Bobby Jones

quote: I could have gone on flying through space forever.
name: Yuri Gagarin

quote: I see Earth! It is so beautiful!
name: Yuri Gagarin

quote: The dinosaurs became extinct because they didn't have a space program.
name: Larry Niven

quote: Without consciousness, space and time are nothing.
name: Robert Lanza

quote: If you look at the old 'Mod Squad's, there was a lot of space in between our dialogue.
name: Peggy Lipton

quote: I left Aerospace because I wanted to go build, and put spacecraft together.
name: Gwynne Shotwell

quote: A 'farm' today means 100,000 chickens in a space the size of a Motel 6 shower stall.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Obama's space policy doesn't differ much from George W. Bush's.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Well, I don't think we should go to the moon. I think we maybe should send some politicians up there.
name: Ron Paul

quote: I've been lucky enough to fly to space twice.
name: Chris Hadfield

quote: I can't say I've ever had a dream about space or that I ponder it all the time.
name: John Glenn

quote: One thing I probably share with everyone else in the astronaut office is composure.
name: Sally Ride

quote: Space tourism is a logical outgrowth of the adventure tourist market.
name: Buzz Aldrin

quote: I think humans will reach Mars, and I would like to see it happen in my lifetime.
name: Buzz Aldrin

quote: We must still think of ourselves as pioneers to understand the importance of space.
name: Buzz Aldrin

quote: Space is the stature of God.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: Space music'd be really something... but they don't have no gravity up there. You couldn't have no downbeat!
name: Miles Davis

quote: The heart looks into space to be away from earth.
name: Richard Jefferies

quote: Eventually there are going to be cities in space.
name: Alan Bean

quote: We knew it was going to be difficult to get to the moon. We didn't know how difficult.
name: Alan Bean

quote: I believe that there may be intelligent life on other planets.
name: Pat Buckley

quote: The two are unrelated. I'm not into turtles or space stuff.
name: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: Space is an inspirational concept that allows you to dream big.
name: Peter Diamandis

quote: My childhood dreams were focused on being part of the effort to make humanity a multiplanetary species.
name: Peter Diamandis

quote: Space isn't remote at all. It's only an hour's drive away if your car could go straight upwards.
name: Fred Hoyle

quote: We want to make sure we get living astronauts to the surface of Mars.
name: Ellen Stofan

quote: Age can be wonderful for red wine, but not for spacecraft.
name: Nathan Myhrvold

quote: As long as there's political uncertainty around the energy space, stock prices will come down.
name: T. Boone Pickens

quote: Those folks out in the space suits are going to be getting beat up.
name: Duane G. Carey

quote: Aviation - and space travel, in particular - have always been especially captivating.
name: Felix Baumgartner

quote: It is difficult to imagine evolution in alien planets operating in any manner other than Darwinian.
name: Simon Conway Morris

quote: It's about how you're using the space. That's what makes live music.
name: Du Yun

quote: I'd love to go back to space, I don't know any astronaut who doesn't want to.
name: Helen Sharman

quote: Words are like untying a corset - you can move into this great space with them.
name: Ali Smith

quote: Building one space station for everyone was and is insane: we should have built a dozen.
name: Larry Niven

quote: I would have taken whatever hand I was dealt. Space was it.
name: Story Musgrave

quote: Sorry; I have no space left for advice. Just do it.
name: Donald E. Westlake

quote: The sun and its retinue of planets drift as a group through the vast gulfs of space that separate the stars.
name: Barney Oliver
